QuestData.Title: Whispers on the Wind
QuestData.Description: I have chased rumors of the Mok'Nathal across Outland with nothing to show for it. Finally, we may have found their home.$b$bBut now that the moment is here, I am filled with unease. Unease that has kept me awake deep into the nights during my search. Will they accept me?$b$bI... know their leader's name: Leoroxx. Seek him out. You must be my eyes in this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Leoroxx at the Mok'Nathal Village in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: What brings you to our village?
